title: Quick Tab Restore Fixes v1.6.4.11
details:
## 6 Critical Quick Tab Restore Issues Fixed

### Issue #1 & #2: Source-Aware Map Cleanup
- UICoordinator.update() now accepts source and isRestoreOperation parameters
- When `source='Manager'` AND `entityMinimized` AND `!domAttached`, Map entry is immediately deleted
- Prevents stale renderedTabs entries that cause duplicate 400x300 windows

### Issue #3: Enhanced Snapshot Logging
- MinimizedManager.restore() logs saved snapshot values before applying
- Logs "âœ“ Snapshot application VERIFIED" on success
- UICoordinator._applySnapshotForRestore() logs entity dimensions before/after

### Issue #4: DOM Dimension Verification
- QuickTabWindow.render() logs container.style.* after createElement()
- Also logs final dimensions after requestAnimationFrame position correction

### Issue #5: isRestoreOperation Flag
- VisibilityHandler._emitRestoreStateUpdate() adds isRestoreOperation: true
- UICoordinator uses this flag to correctly route restore even when both entity and instance have minimized=false

### Issue #6: Source Parameter Flow
- setupStateListeners() extracts source from event
- update() accepts source parameter and logs all source-based decisions

### Key Method Signature Change
```javascript
// OLD: update(quickTab)
// NEW: update(quickTab, source = 'unknown', isRestoreOperation = false)
```

This is backward compatible due to default parameters.
